On [[28 October]] [[1965]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] sent '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to a Mr P.M. Cowan'''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/UNIQUE-RARE-Signed-Tolkien-1965-Letter-with-ENVELOP-Mr-Cowan-Hobbit-Ring-Gollum/112655777574|articlename=Signed Tolkien 1965 Letter with ENVELOP Mr Cowan|dated=|website=[http://www.ebay.co.uk/ ebay.co.uk]|accessed=26 November 2017}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?forum=18&post_id=18220#forumpost18220|articlename=Is it just me or does the letter look a lot like a photocopy?|dated=|website=Guide|accessed=26 November 2017}}</ref>

*'''Subject:''' Tolkien answers a young fan (aged 9 in 1965) concerning the ''[[The Lord of the Rings Index]]''. 
*'''Publication:''' None.
